bTreatAsButton: Set this to true to treat the joystick as a simple button
Image1: For sticks, this is the Thumb
Image2: For sticks, this is the Background
Center:
The initial center point of the control. If Time Until Reset is < 0, control resets back to here.
Use negative numbers to invert positioning from top to bottom, left to right. (if <= 1.0, it's relative to screen, > 1.0 is absolute)
VisualSize: The size of the control (if <= 1.0, it's relative to screen, > 1.0 is absolute)
ThumbSize: For sticks, the size of the thumb (if <= 1.0, it's relative to screen, > 1.0 is absolute)
InteractionSize: The interactive size of the control. Measured outward from Center. (if <= 1.0, it's relative to screen, > 1.0 is absolute)
MainInputKey: The main input to send from this control (for sticks, this is the horizontal axis)
AltInputKey: The alternate input to send from this control (for sticks, this is the vertical axis)
